column4: I'm planning on switching to Ubuntu Edgy Eft, but my Modem Drivers are not Recommended for kernel versions 2.6.17.1 to 2.6.17.7, However, 2.6.17.8+ Versions are supported. Can anybody tell me the last number in Ubuntu's Edgy Eft Kernel Version (2.6.17.x)
the kernel number doesn't match the vainilla kernel, because the ubuntu kernel has in fact 1.6.18 backports included.
